name: 3D Don't Die Mr Robot
storyline:
In this psychedelic arcade collect 'em up, you'll face wave after wave of brutal baddies out to stop Mr. Robot eating their precious fruits.

When Mr. Robot (that's you!) eats a fruit it explodes, destroying any enemies within its blast radius.

Careful though, because an exploding fruit can set off a chain reaction causing other fruit to explode filling the screen with destruction and more importantly, Points!

The goal of the game is to survive as long as you can in the Neon Dunjun and score as many points as you can before your inevitable death.

Simple controls, one more go gameplay, banging tunes... and Fruit! What more could you ask for?
summary: Fresh from the Neon Dunjun, Mr. Robot returns in the third dimension!
